name: Transmission Of Security Parameters
description: The information system reliably associates security parameters with information exchanged between information systems.\n
supplemental_guidance: Security parameters include, for example, security labels and markings. Security parameters may be explicitly or implicitly associated with the information contained within the information system.\n

rev5.name: Transmission of Security and Privacy Attributes
rev5.changes_from_rev4: Title changed from 'Transmission of Security Attributes' Parameter adds 'and privacy'Â   Discussion expanded to provide detailed explanation of attributes
